description: Luxurious apartment with panoramic views of Central Park. High-end finishes, gourmet kitchen, spacious bedrooms, and a private terrace. Building amenities include a fitness center, concierge service, and rooftop garden. Close to upscale shopping and dining.

Charming brownstone in a prime Brooklyn location. Renovated kitchen, original details, hardwood floors, and a backyard garden. Walkable to Prospect Park, trendy cafes, and boutique shops. Easy access to public transportation.

Modern condo with skyline views, open layout, updated appliances, and a balcony. Building features a gym, outdoor space, and parking. Located in a vibrant neighborhood with diverse dining options and cultural attractions.

Historic brownstone with character, exposed brick, high ceilings, and original hardwood floors. Renovated kitchen and bathrooms. Close to transportation, Harlem's restaurant row, and cultural landmarks.

Spacious townhouse with a private backyard, updated kitchen, formal dining room, and finished basement. Located in a tree-lined neighborhood with top-rated schools, parks, and easy access to public transit.
Modern loft-style condo with industrial accents, high ceilings, oversized windows, and a shared rooftop deck. Close to waterfront parks, artisanal eateries, and eclectic boutiques.

Renovated co-op with skyline views, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood floors. Building amenities include a doorman, laundry room, and bike storage. Steps away from Columbia University, parks, and transportation.

Classic brick row house with modern upgrades, sunlit living spaces, hardwood floors, and a backyard oasis. Ideal for outdoor entertaining. Convenient access to local shops, restaurants, and the waterfront promenade.

Sleek condo with floor-to-ceiling windows, a gourmet kitchen, spa-like bathrooms, and a private terrace overlooking the city skyline. Building amenities include a fitness center, lounge, and landscaped garden.
Recently renovated single-family home with an updated kitchen, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms, and a backyard. Quiet residential neighborhood near parks, schools, and shopping centers.
